name.th: Shopee Image Downloader (ตัวดาวน์โหลดรูปภาพ Shopee)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download Shopee product images and videos easily with this popular tool!
Click once to save Shopee images in high quality directly to your computer. Simple and efficient!

⭐ **Getting Started:**

🚀 Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension.
🛍️ Open your target Shopee product page.
📸 Click on the Shopee Image Downloader icon to open it.
📥 Download product images by variants, main, and description.
📊 Export images and video details to Excel.

⭐ **Features:**

❤️free
🗂️ Download Single Images (*.jpeg)

💎pro
🖼️ One Click Download Images (*.zip,*.xlsx)
🎥 Download Videos (*.mp4)


❓ **Is it free?**
Yes, Shopee Image Downloader is free to use.

❓ **Why Choose Shopee Image Downloader?**

⚡ Fast and easy way to download Shopee product images and videos.
📝 Export product information including titles, SKUs, variants, and URLs directly to Excel.
📈 Perfect for sellers, researchers, and anyone needing to save product details from Shopee.

📬 **Contact Us:**
Please do not hesitate to contact us with any questions at 📧 webstarue@gmail.com.
